p: All chemicals were purchased from Sigma-Aldrich (Milan, Italy), whereas HPLC-grade solvents were obtained from Carlo Erba Reagenti (Milan, Italy). Double-distilled water was obtained using a Millipore Milli-Q Plus water treatment system (Millipore Bedford Corp., Bedford, MA, USA). HPLC photo diode array (PDA) phenolic patterns were established using the validated method reported in the literature [ 18]. Data are reported as means Â± standard deviation of three independent measurements.
